name: cart
description: Cart is used for viewing all the items added to the cart, allows user to proceed to checkout.

showOutOfStockErrors.description: Shows error messages when items are out of stock or the quantity exceeds the stock

showShippingChargesForLineItems.friendlyName: Show shipping charges for line items
showShippingChargesForLineItems.description: If shipping charges are available at the line level when the item is on the cart, display the charges

imageSettings.description: Image settings for cart line item

featureName.friendlyName: Enter the feature code that needs to be enabled.
featureName.description: This feature code, if enabled in HQ, will add the functionality.

pickUpAtStoreWithLocationText.comment: Text for pick up at store checkbox when location is specified

bopisSelectAStore.comment: Header for BOPIS (Buy Online Pickup In Store) dialog

orLabel.comment: The label that shows up between the guest checkout button and the signed-in checkout button, when the application is in an anonymous user state

outOfStockErrorMessageHeader.comment: Display text for Out of stock error message

outOfStockErrorMessage.comment: Display text for Out of stock error message
outOfStockErrorMessage.value: This product is no longer available. Please remove it from the bag.

errorMessageOutOfRangeOneLeft.value: There is only one product left. Please choose quantity within the available range
errorMessageOutOfRangeOneLeft.comment: Error message to show when quantity selected is more than the quantity left, and only one product is left

errorMessageOutOfRangeFormat.value: There are only {numLeft} products left. Please choose quantity within the available range
errorMessageOutOfRangeFormat.comment: Error message to show when quantity selected is more than the quantity left. {numLeft} is the number of products left.

failToGetCartText.comment: Text for fail to get cart

cartRemoveButtonAriaLabel.comment: Aria label for the remove button

pickUpAtStoreText.comment: Text for pick up at store checkbox

waitingClass.comment: CSS class for the waiting class

decrementButtonAriaLabel.comment: Aria label for the quantity decrease button
decrementButtonAriaLabel.value: Press to decrease the quantity by 1

incrementButtonAriaLabel.comment: Aria label for the quantity increment button

inputQuantityAriaLabel.comment: Aria label for the input quantity

saveForLaterText.comment: string to save for later text

nameOfWishlist.comment: string for name of the wishlist

productDimensionTypeColor.comment: String that corresponds to the Color Product Dimension Type (1)

productDimensionTypeSize.comment: String that corresponds to the Size Product Dimension Type (3)

productDimensionTypeStyle.comment: String that corresponds to the Style Product Dimension Type (4)

productDimensionTypeConfiguration.comment: String that corresponds to the Style Product Dimension Configuration (2)

shipInsteadDisplayText.comment: String that corresponds to the ship instead display text

changeStoreDisplayText.comment: String that corresponds to the change store display text

quantityDisplayText.comment: String that corresponds to the quantity display text

shipToAddressDisplayText.comment: String that corresponds to the ship it to an address display text

pickItUpDisplayText.comment: String that corresponds to the pick it up display text

totalSavingsText.comment: String that corresponds to the total savings display text

originalPriceText.comment: String that corresponds to the original price screen reader text

currentPriceText.comment: String that corresponds to the current price screen reader text

cartLoadingErrorMessage.comment: String that corresponds to the error message that is shown when essential data actions fail
cartLoadingErrorMessage.value: Sorry we are unable to load your cart at this moment, please try again later.

shippingCharges.comment: String associated with shipping charges line display text

totalSavings.comment: String associated with Total Savings display text

conditionsText.comment: String associated with Legal disclaimer for order total display text

yetToBeCalculatedText.comment: String associated with to be calculated display text

orderTotal.comment: String associated with order total line display text

otherCharges.comment: String associated with other charge line display text

notApplicationForCartOrderSummary.comment: String associated with order total line display text

backToShoppingButtonTitle.comment: Label for back to shopping button

addToWishlistButtonText.comment: Label for Move to wishlist button

removeFromWishlistButtonText.comment: Label for Remove from wishlist button

invalidPromoCodeErrorText.comment: To show invalid promo code message

failedToAddPromoCodeErrorText.comment: To show message on fail to add promo code

failedToRemovePromoCodeErrorText.comment: To show message on fail to add promo code

duplicatePromotionErrorText.comment: Text to be shown when adding a duplicate promotion code

createOrderTemplateFromCartButton.comment: Label for creating creating template from cart button
createOrderTemplateFromCartButton.value: Save all items to order template

createOrderTemplateHeader.comment: Text for create order template dialog header

orderTemplateTitle.comment: Text for create order template dialog title

orderTemplateNameAriaLabel.comment: Text for create order template dialog template name input aria label

createOrderTemplateDescription.value: Order templates will be saved to your account. You can reuse them in the future to speed up the checkout process. Create an order template and add this item to it.
createOrderTemplateDescription.comment: Text for create order template dialog description

createNewOrderTemplateButtonText.comment: Text for create order template dialog create new button

createOrderTemplateButtonText.comment: Text for create order template dialog create button

cancelNewOrderTemplateCreationButtonText.comment: Text for create order template dialog cancel button

defaultOrderTemplateName.comment: Text for create order template dialog default order template name

addToOrderTemplateHeader.comment: Text for add to order template dialog header

noOrderTemplatesMessage.value: You have not created any order templates.
noOrderTemplatesMessage.comment: Text for add to order template dialog message

noOrderTemplatesDescription.value: Order templates will be saved to your account. You can reuse them in the future to speed up the checkout process. Create an order template and add this item to it.
noOrderTemplatesDescription.comment: Text for add to order template dialog description

createAnOrderTemplateButtonText.comment: Text for creating an order template button

cancelOrderTemplateCreationButtonText.comment: Text for canceling adding to order template dialog

selectTemplatesText.value: Select a template or create a new one. You have {0} template(s).
selectTemplatesText.comment: Text for add to order template dialog description

addToTemplateButtonText.comment: Text for add to order template dialog button

lineItemsText.comment: Text for add to order template dialog order template description

addToOrderTemplateButtonText.comment: Text for add to order template button

addToOrderTemplateMessage.comment: Text for showing for adding item to your order template message

addItemToOrderTemplateError.value: Unable to add item to order template
addItemToOrderTemplateError.comment: For showing error message on adding item to order template

viewOrderTemplateButtonText.comment: View order template text on item added to order template dialog

continueShoppingButtonText.comment: Continue shopping on item added to order template dialog

linesAddedToOrderTemplateHeaderItemsOneT.comment: View order template text on cart added to order template dialog

linesAddedToOrderTemplateHeaderItemsForm.comment: View order template text on cart added to order template dialog

linesAddedToOrderTemplateHeaderLinesOneT.comment: View order template text on cart added to order template dialog

linesAddedToOrderTemplateHeaderLinesForm.comment: View order template text on cart added to order template dialog

linesAddedToOrderTemplateHeaderMessageTe.comment: View order template text on cart added to order template dialog

itemAddedToOrderTemplateHeaderItemOneTex.comment: View order template text on item added to order template dialog

itemAddedToOrderTemplateHeaderItemFormat.comment: View order template text on item added to order template dialog

itemAddedToOrderTemplateHeaderMessageTex.comment: View order template text on item added to order template dialog

freePriceText.comment: View order template text on item added to order template dialog

duplicatedProductsHeader.comment: Error dialog header when order template already has the same item added

duplicatedProductsDescription.value: This product has been added to the selected order template in the past. Do you want to update the product quantity in the order template?
duplicatedProductsDescription.comment: Error dialog description when order template already has the same item added

updateQuantityButtonText.comment: Error dialog cancel button text when order template already has the same item added

cancelDuplicateItemsButtonText.comment: Error dialog override quantity button text when order template already has the same item added

storeSelector.description: Store Selector to use with the Find In Store component
